review: Works great and better than expected

review: Good product and great price. Used it every day.

review: This is a fun little gadget that allows me to access the Internet wirelessly to my big screen TV.
author: Kimberly Shelow "deal finder"

review: This little jewel is a must have.

review: Awesome product if you have an android phone. It works for iPhone users but not well and has glitches. They say it's for everyone but it's really not.
author: Michael

review: It never worked properly. It kept crashing my browser. The movie would stream for a couple minutes then crash -- YouTube, Netflix and Amazon. I'd have to reboot my computer. I kept hoping for some kind of software upgrade that would fix it. I sent it back.
author: Kathryn
